definition: syntactically establishing a relation of contrast between sentences or elements of a sentence
details:
adjective
- syntactically establishing a relation of contrast between sentences or elements of a sentence
= example: syntactically establishing a relation of contrast between sentences or elements of a sentence
- strikingly different
= synonyms: contrasting
- of words so related that one contrasts with the other
= example: of words so related that one contrasts with the other
= synonyms: incompatible
